html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13242013-12-03IC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAn Act to promote the efficiency and adaptability of the Canadian economy by regulating certain activities that discourage reliance on electronic means of carrying out commercial activities, and to amend the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act, the Competition Act, the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act and the Telecommunications Act
SubjectElectronic Commerce Protection Regulations
PrecisELECTRONIC COMMERCE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to define key terms used in Canada’s Anti-spam Legislation which will provide clarity and legal certainty to effectively combat spam and other related electronic threats in Canada as well as provide relief to businesses through targeted exclusions where the broad application of the Act would otherwise discourage reliance on electronic means of carrying out commercial activities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0221 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
act: An Act to promote the efficiency and adaptability of the Canadian economy by regulating certain activities that discourage reliance on electronic means of carrying out commercial activities, and to amend the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act, the Competition Act, the Personal Information Protection and Electronic Documents Act and the Telecommunications Act
subject: Electronic Commerce Protection Regulations
precis: ELECTRONIC COMMERCE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to define key terms used in Canada’s Anti-spam Legislation which will provide clarity and legal certainty to effectively combat spam and other related electronic threats in Canada as well as provide relief to businesses through targeted exclusions where the broad application of the Act would otherwise discourage reliance on electronic means of carrying out commercial activities.
